ak.name: AK
ak.description: Ak is king, the best survivor. No one else can be a liver! You can’t stab or shoot him dead Or put a pitchfork in his head Drown him, burn him, mutilate him, Cut his nose, defenestrate him, Punch him, scrunch him, stab his back—He’ll survive it. All hail Ak!

chuffy.name: Chuffy
chuffy.description: Chuffy’s face might make you sick, But Chuffy’s knife is awful quick. And if you are his stabby pick—Then knife goes in you, stick stick stick! Lickwound clanmates always knowed That Chuffy’s pals sometimes explode But not that Chuffy! He’s bestowed With lucky luck from lucky toad!
